Articles.Content: You then run screaming back to level 121... avoiding the hole, but the dinosaur breaks through the floor and confronts you...

You suddenly realise that you\'ve been inactive on the KSP forum for way too long and quickly resolve to use it more often if only the dinosaur will go away which it promptly does. Then you notice the Squad logo on the side. You take a calm stroll down to floor 120 and buy a drink... some sort of drink. Come to think of it, it tastes a little like rocket fuel... How do you know what that tastes like? Don\'t ask.
You then attempt to climb the stairs to 121 and find them destroyed, so you cobble together a flimsy little rocket and fly there instead.
On floor +123 there is a Wind tunnel a telephone and a *Sigh* Jeb do you mind doing that out of the window, People can see you you know!

You push Jeb out the window with your flying contraption on and it sputters and dies. Fair enough to say you may not see him for a while. Then you realise you need to use the toilet and the last one you saw was on ground floor...
You decide to take the elevator which is broken down. You realise there is a parachute and jump off the building...
The parachute fails and you find the ground. Fast.
A day later, you walk out of the emergency room and up onto the first floor.
by this time you have already been to the toilet and so proceed to walk to floor 124
You walk up to floor 125, where you find... Nothing. Floor 125 is nonexistent, it just goes straight from 124 to 126. Weird, huh? Anyways, on floor 126 you find...
Floor 126 is a room containing forbidden knowledge. However, the knowldge sees you and runs off to maintain it\'s forbidden status, and you proceed to floor 127, where you find...
Your worst nightmare. Fleeing from this takes you to floor 127, where you find...
You go down to level 126 and find a portal gun.
From level 126 (which was somehow found on level 127), you portal to the next level up...
and find a ladder. Climbing up it takes you to floor 128, where you find...
An endless staircase.
Instead of climbing the endless staircase, you take the elevator up to floor 129, where you find...
An army of sentient gym socks. Holding your nose, you climb up to floor 130 and find...
A ladder to a tower across from you. You climb over to the other tower and...
The tower has it\'s lobby on the current floor (130) which is strange, but you wonder what could be underneath if this is ground floor. You get to floor 129 and find...

Find zombies.. You also find some arrows and a crossbow.

You go to the 128th floor and find...
Artemis Fowl. He hands you a card that reads...
... Hail Probe :hailprobe:. You don\'t know why you have it it and proceed to floor 129...
On Level 129 you meet C7Studios and he gives you a spaceplane that someone needs to 'beta test'. You fly it, it does a big loop-da-loop and you end up on Level 130
on level 130 you find jeb kerman singing diggy hole
